name: Passion in the Apache Pass
description:
Arizona, 1863. You're an Union soldier on your way to Fort Bowie, in the Apache Pass, but you never imagined you'd find love in such a place. Specially, not in a gentle, ten-foot-long scorpion. 

Passion in the Apache Pass is a visual novel about the strangest love in the strangest circumstances.

Inspired by the pulp short story Terror en el Apache Pass by Julio M. Freixa.

Made by Pablo Dapena and Sergio de Frutos. 

Music interpreted by Warren Trachtman.

Font m5x7 by managore.

The game is not finished yet and we'll keep updating it in the following weeks!
